<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Intensify Investiture](/Feats.aspx?ID=3721) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 46</row>

**Frequency**
once per 10 minutes

</column>

---

Your bond to your invested items enables you to put more of yourself into them. If you next action is to activate an invested item that has a saving throw DC, you can use your thaumaturge class DC instead of the item's DC if it is higher.
name: Intensify Investiture
